name: Bright Lancer
description:
*Instructions*

IF YOU CHOOSE TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME, PLEASE READ THE DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS. IT IS NOT AS SIMPLE OF A PROCESS AS YOU WOULD THINK.

How to Play

Gamepad (Recommended Method): (PS4 and Xbox Controllers) 

Move - Left Joystick

Aim/Attack - Square(PS4) / X(Xbox)

Quick Dash - X(PS4) / A(Xbox)

Teleport - Hold Triangle (PS4) / Y(Xbox) to charge, Left Joystick to point in the direction you want to Teleport. The longer you hold, the farther you go. Release Triangle (PS4) / Y(Xbox) to execute Teleport

Mouse + Keyboard:

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Aim/Attack - Point in the direction you want to attack and click

Quick Dash - Spacebar

Teleport - Hold Shift to charge, use Mouse to point in the direction you want to Teleport. The longer you hold Shift, the farther you go. Release Shift to execute Teleport
